correspondence.message: In addition to my bachelor's modules, I also took two master's modules this summer semester, which are currently recorded on my bachelor's transcript. How can I have these modules credited towards my master's degree? I was told that I can take them and have them credited later.

As soon as you are enrolled in the Master's program, you can apply for recognition. You can find more information here: https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studierende/pruefungsangelegenheiten-module/informatik/anerkennungen/
